data.persona: I'm a king who rules over a large country. I inherited my position from my father when he died. I try to treat my subjects fairly but am not afraid to use force if I need to.
data.description:
You are in the The Lower Dungeon Guard Room.
This chamber, a full 30 feet below the Upper Dungeon, isn't made of stone blocks, it's hewn from the living rock of the earth.  10 by 15 feet, its domed ceiling and walls show the tool marks its excavation.  There are numerous lines of filth on the walls marking the various levels that water has risen up the walls during previous rainy seasons.

A wobbly table sits in the center of the room, but there are no chairs to go with it.  Rusty cuffs hang from rusty pegs driven into the wall.  The smell is horrific.
There's a manical and a peg here.
The murderer is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must hit the murderer so that he feels great pain.
data.mid_motivation: I must make the murderer confess to his crimes and tell me where his living captives are.
data.long_motivation: I must save the townsfolk man children so that they will support my rule over the kingdom.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: get Captive location Information  from Murderer

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give Captive location information to Royal guard
